References

Amoako-Tuffour, Yaw, Nicholas Jufas, Jack Quach, Lisa Le, Guy Earle, Akhilesh A. Kotiya, and Manohar Bance. 2016. “Acoustic Transmission Characteristics of a Eustachian Tube Volitionally Opened in Two Living Subjects.” Otology & Neurotology: Official Publication of the American Otological Society, American Neurotology Society [and] European Academy of Otology and Neurotology 37 (8): 1055–58. https://doi.org/10.1097/MAO.0000000000001130.
Quach, Jack, Olga Theou, Mario U. Pérez-Zepeda, Judith Godin, Kenneth Rockwood, and Dustin S. Kehler. 2022. “Effect of a physical activity intervention and frailty on frailty trajectory and major mobility disability.” Journal of the American Geriatrics Society, July. https://doi.org/10.1111/jgs.17941.
Stubeda, Herman, Jack Quach, Jennifer Gao, Lesya M. Shuba, Marcelo T. Nicolela, Balwantray C. Chauhan, and Jayme R. Vianna. 2022. “Comparing Five Criteria for Evaluating Glaucomatous Visual Fields.” American Journal of Ophthalmology 237 (May): 154–63. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ajo.2021.10.010.
Vianna, Jayme R., Victoria R. Lanoe, Jack Quach, Glen P. Sharpe, Donna M. Hutchison, Anne C. Belliveau, Lesya M. Shuba, Marcelo T. Nicolela, and Balwantray C. Chauhan. 2017. “Serial Changes in Lamina Cribrosa Depth and Neuroretinal Parameters in Glaucoma: Impact of Choroidal Thickness.” Ophthalmology 124 (9): 1392–402. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ophtha.2017.03.048.
